creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hollow silver sphere shaped like a pumpkin or gourd with ridges; four tiny holes on bottom; top has a small sphere with wire "s" which attaches to are lobe; seam in middle where haves were joined
dimension: 3 1/2 x 2 x 2 in. (8.89 x 5.08 x 5.08 cm) (each, including wire)
title: Pair of Earrings
